question: Which steel company has withdrawn its membership from the apex steel industry body, Indian Steel Association (ISA)?
explanation:
One of the countryâ€™s leading steel manufacturers Tata Steel has recently withdrawn its membership from the Indian Steel Association (ISA).
The CEO and Managing Director of Tata Steel- T V Narendran, who had been the President of ISA, also stepped down from the position, with its tenure ending this August. Other members of the association of steel industry are JSW Steel, Steel Authority of India Ltd (SAIL), Rashtriya Ispat Nigam Ltd (RINL), Jindal Steel and Power Ltd (JSPL) and ArcelorMittal Nippon Steel Ltd.
